description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Review_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Review_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Review_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Review_Type_Data.description: Reference ID of the Review Type.

Review_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Review_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Review_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Review_Type_Data.description: Container for the Review Category of the Review Type.
Whether the review is initiated for the individual employee related to this review type.
Whether the review is initiated by the individual employee related to this review type.

validation.validation: You can't specify Review Initiated by Employee if Review Category is Disciplinary Action or Performance Improvement Plan.

Review_Type_Data.description: The count employee review templates that this Review Type is associated with. This field is for Extracts only and not for loads.

validation.validation: Enter a Review Type Name that isn't already in use.
You can't delete a Review Type that is in use.

description: Delete flag for a Review Type Reference.
